Exclusion criteria include cirrhosis or chronic liver disease, current thiamine supplementation, clinical indication for thiamine, comfort measures only designation, inability to provide consent, and other causes for lactate elevation.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for healthy female participants of childbearing potential, testing the coadministration of JNJ-64155806 and ethinylestradiol/drospirenone contraception, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a clinical trial for a drug called alectinib, which is being tested for the treatment of various types of lung cancer and thyroid cancer that carry specific genetic mutations (RET rearrangement or ALK rearrangement). The trial is divided into three phases (phase 1, phase 2 Cohorts A&B, and phase 2 Cohort C) and has specific eligibility criteria for enrollment, including prior treatment history, disease status, and organ function.

This phase 1 trial is investigating the use of cyclophosphamide and alemtuzumab in patients with non-Hodgkin lymphoma, including high-grade B-cell lymphoma and diffuse large B-cell lymphoma, who are ineligible for standard curative therapeutic options.

This sample is a phase 1 trial testing the drugs entospletinib, daunorubicin, and cytarabine for the treatment of hematologic malignancies, specifically acute myeloid leukemia, with specific eligibility criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase I clinical trial for patients with COPD and pulmonary hypertension, testing the efficacy of inhaled nitric oxide as a treatment option. The eligibility criteria include a confirmed diagnosis of COPD, specific pulmonary hypertension measurements, and a history of tobacco smoking.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for asthma patients, testing the drugs bi 443651 and placebo, with eligibility criteria including a diagnosis of asthma, specific spirometric criteria, age range, ACQ value, PD20 value, BMI range, and ability to perform study procedures. Exclusion criteria include significant pulmonary diseases, recent respiratory tract infection or asthma exacerbation, hospitalization or intubation for asthma, high serum potassium, recent blood donation, recent use of certain asthma medications, use of diuretics or drugs that may influence trial results, prolonged QT/QTc interval, history of risk factors for Torsades de Points, relevant allergies/hypersensitivities, and smoking history.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for patients with metastatic renal cell carcinoma, testing the efficacy of tivozanib and nivolumab as treatment options, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria outlined.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for a drug called ASN002, which is being tested for the treatment of chronic atopic dermatitis. The trial aims to evaluate the safety and efficacy of ASN002 compared to a placebo, and includes eligibility criteria such as having a certain percentage of body surface area affected by dermatitis, a history of inadequate response to other treatments, and willingness to comply with study procedures.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for asthma patients, testing the drugs azd9898 and matching placebo. The eligibility criteria include age, BMI, and asthma diagnosis, while the exclusion criteria include various medical conditions, substance use, and previous participation in the study.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for psoriasis, testing the drugs abbv-553 and placebo, with eligibility criteria including age, gender, BMI, general health condition, and specific criteria for subsudy 2.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for rheumatoid arthritis (RA) patients who are severely active and have started etanercept treatment within the last 3 months. The study aims to evaluate the efficacy of niclosamide and etanercept compared to a placebo in treating RA. The inclusion and exclusion criteria are specified, including restrictions on NSAID and MTX use, hypersensitivity to niclosamide, renal and hepatic impairment, pregnancy or breastfeeding, and the presence of other connective tissue diseases or hypothyroid disease.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with type 1 diabetes mellitus, testing the effectiveness of biochaperone® insulin lispro, fiasp®, and novorapid® in managing the disease, with specific eligibility criteria for inclusion and exclusion.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for Alzheimer's disease, testing the drugs np001 and placebo, with eligibility criteria including age, diagnosis, cognitive scores, and exclusion criteria such as other neurologic disorders and unstable medical illness.

This sample is a phase I clinical trial for patients with squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck, testing the drug ribociclib, and includes eligibility criteria such as specific disease types, organ function requirements, and exclusion criteria such as hypersensitivity to the drug or concurrent malignancy requiring treatment.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial investigating the use of sildenafil vaginal suppositories in women with infertility, specifically those with normal ovarian reserve and a history of failed IVF/ICSI attempts. The inclusion criteria include factors such as FSH levels, prior IVF/ICSI attempts, endometrial thickness, and normal endometrial appearance, while exclusion criteria include conditions like PCOS, myomectomy, Asherman's Syndrome, and mullerian anomalies.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for individuals with HIV infections, testing the combination of disulfiram and vorinostat drugs to reverse HIV latency, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase I clinical trial for patients with urothelial carcinoma, testing the drugs atezolizumab and radium-223, with specific eligibility criteria including histologic diagnosis, bone metastasis, ECOG performance status, and progression of disease after platinum-containing chemotherapy.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 clinical trial for cystic fibrosis, testing the drugs iva, tez/iva, vx-445, matched placebo, tez, and vx-561, with specific eligibility criteria including age, body mass index, CFTR genotype, and FEV1 value.
This sample is a phase I clinical trial for nicotine dependence, testing the drugs mifepristone and placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for male smokers aged 18 to 55 years.

This sample is a phase I trial investigating the use of direct acting anti-viral therapy using epclusa or zepatier in patients with kidney transplant and hepatitis C, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligibility.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for neovascular age-related macular degeneration, testing the drugs gb-102 and aflibercept, with key inclusion criteria including age ≥ 50, presence of an active CNV lesion, and evidence of increased vascular permeability and/or loss of visual acuity. Key exclusion criteria include a history of cardiac events, uncontrolled hypertension or diabetes, chronic renal disease, abnormal liver function, and pregnancy or lactation.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for patients with hepatocellular carcinoma, testing the drug meclizine oral tablet, and includes eligibility criteria such as confirmed imaging of the disease, no prior treatment for HCC, normal organ function, and willingness to use contraception.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for patients with myelodysplastic syndromes, testing the effectiveness of drugs such as nivolumab, azacitidine, and fludarabine, among others, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase I clinical trial for patients diagnosed with schizophrenia who are receiving a stable dose of clozapine and aims to test the administration of vorinostat oral capsules as a potential treatment option, while excluding patients taking specific psychotropic medications and those with certain medical conditions or contraindications to vorinostat.
This sample is a phase I trial for the treatment of pulmonary hypertension, testing the effectiveness of albuterol and placebo in patients with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for the treatment of chronic hepatitis B, testing the drugs eyp001a, placebo, entecavir, and peg-interferon alfa-2a, with eligibility criteria including documented positive HBsAg and HBV DNA levels, specific age and BMI ranges, normal lab test results, and various exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for patients with inoperable, locally advanced or metastatic pancreatic cancer, testing the drug plerixafor, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for patients with metastatic colorectal cancer, testing the combination of irinotecan and capecitabine as a treatment option, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial testing the effectiveness of cytisine, a drug used for smoking cessation, on regular moderate cigarette smokers who want to quit smoking. The eligibility criteria include being a healthy male or female between 18-65+ years of age, having certain levels of urine cotinine and expired air carbon monoxide, and having no clinically significant abnormalities in various tests. Exclusion criteria include recent use of smoking cessation medications, hypersensitivity to cytisine or its derivatives, and current treatment with certain medications.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for the treatment of lung diseases, including cystic fibrosis, using inhaled snsp113 and a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for a drug called bay1817080 and a matching placebo, targeting refractory chronic cough in patients who have not responded to targeted treatment for underlying triggers such as reflux disease, asthma, and post-nasal drip. The eligibility criteria include age restrictions, non-smoking history, and the use of contraception for sexually active participants.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for osteoarthritis, testing the drugs glpg1972 cohort 1, glpg1972 cohort 2, glpg1972 cohort 3, and placebo, with inclusion criteria including age, diagnosis of OA, BMI range, and good health, and exclusion criteria including recent injections, hypersensitivity to study drug ingredients, immunosuppressive condition, and history of malignancy.

This sample is a phase 1 trial testing the drugs omnitram, tramadol, and placebo for the treatment of pain, with eligibility criteria including age between 18 and 50, normal vital signs, adequate hematologic and liver function, negative pregnancy and substance abuse tests, and exclusion criteria such as history of seizures or liver disease, use of certain medications, and unstable acute or chronic diseases.

This sample is a phase 1 trial testing the use of nasal and intramuscular glucagon in patients with type 1 diabetes mellitus who have been on insulin therapy for at least 2 years, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for patients with Hodgkin's lymphoma who have relapsed or are refractory to prior treatments, and are relapsed or refractory to nivolumab treatment. The study will test the effectiveness of nivolumab and bendamustine hydrochloride as potential treatments.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with diffuse large B-cell lymphoma or mediastinal B-cell lymphoma, testing the effectiveness of idelalisib, rituximab, ifosfamide, carboplatin, and etoposide as treatment options, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1 trial testing the drugs atezolizumab, emactuzumab, and obinutuzumab for the treatment of non-Hodgkin lymphoma, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria outlined.
This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for the drug "gsk2798745" and placebo in patients with chronic idiopathic cough, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with hepatocellular carcinoma, testing the combination of nivolumab and bevacizumab as a second-line therapy option, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria outlined.

This sample is a phase 1 trial testing the drugs ds-8201a, ritonavir, and itraconazole on patients with unresectable or metastatic solid malignant tumors that are refractory to or intolerable with prior chemotherapy, and have HER2 expression.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 clinical trial for patients with BRAF V600 mutation-positive unresectable and/or metastatic malignant cutaneous melanoma, testing the combination therapy of dabrafenib and trametinib, with eligibility criteria including confirmed mutation, disease progression, and ECOG Performance Status of 0 or 1.
This sample is a phase 1 trial testing the drugs bupivacaine low, bupivacaine high, and neosaxitoxin for anesthesia and analgesia in subjects who meet specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for healthy participants, testing the drugs al-794 and placebo, with inclusion criteria including BMI range, negative pregnancy test for females, and exclusion criteria including abnormal laboratory results and positive screening tests for HIV and hepatitis.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for the treatment of amyloidosis using drugs such as gsk2315698 and gsk2398852, with specific eligibility criteria including age, disease confirmation, and stable heart condition.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for patients with advanced or metastatic solid tumors or lymphoma, testing the drugs mln9708 and nelfinavir. The eligibility criteria include specific requirements for creatinine levels, blood counts, and performance status, as well as contraception guidelines for female and male patients. The exclusion criteria include various medical conditions, recent surgeries or radiotherapy, and allergies to study medications.
This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for atopic dermatitis, testing the drugs sb414 2%, sb414 6%, and vehicle, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.
This sample is a phase 1 trial for the treatment of psoriasis using the drugs sb414 6% and vehicle, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial for the treatment of pulmonary arterial hypertension using treprostinil inhalation powder, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligible participants.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for asthma patients, testing the effects of itraconazole powder and itraconazole 200 mg on lung function, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase I clinical trial for patients with pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma, testing the efficacy of pegylated recombinant human hyaluronidase and avelumab as a first-line treatment option, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria outlined.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial testing the safety and efficacy of multiple drugs, including pb2452 infusion and ticagrelor oral tablet, in healthy subjects with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial investigating the use of nitric oxide in patients with coronary artery disease requiring coronary artery bypass grafting, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria. The study aims to evaluate the effects of nitric oxide on reperfusion injury and myocardial function.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with relapsed or refractory multiple myeloma, testing lenalidomide, melphalan, and plerixafor as treatment options, with specific eligibility criteria including NY-ESO-1 positivity and HLA-A*0201 positivity.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial testing the drug gemcabene for the treatment of familial partial lipodystrophy, hypertriglyceridemia, fatty liver, and nonalcoholic steatohepatitis (NASH), with specific eligibility criteria including clinical diagnosis, genetic diagnosis, hepatic steatosis, triglyceride levels, and BMI.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial that aims to evaluate the efficacy of vorolanib, nivolumab, and pembrolizumab in treating various types of solid tumors, including hepatocellular carcinoma, gastric cancer, and gastroesophageal junction adenocarcinoma, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for patients with castration-resistant prostate cancer, testing the drug cyclophosphamide. The inclusion criteria include confirmed adenocarcinoma of the prostate, radiographically documented metastatic disease, and previous progression following various therapies. The exclusion criteria include neuroendocrine or small cell cancer of the prostate, history of other malignant diseases, and recent administration of experimental or immunotherapy treatments.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 clinical trial for patients with Parkinson's disease, testing the drugs IRL790 and placebo. The inclusion criteria include being aged 50-85, having a diagnosis of idiopathic PD, and showing a clear peak-dose dyskinetic response to regular L-Dopa medication. The exclusion criteria include a history of clinically significant diseases or disorders, psychiatric diagnosis, seizures, hepatic or renal disease, and recent illness or surgery.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with recurrent or refractory central nervous system lymphoma or diffuse large b-cell lymphoma, testing the drug lenalidomide as a potential treatment option. The eligibility criteria include specific disease characteristics, performance status, blood counts, and organ function, among others.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 clinical trial for patients with metastatic prostate cancer or endometrial cancer, testing the drugs rucaparib and nivolumab. The eligibility criteria include specific disease requirements, prior treatments, and normal organ function.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for knee osteoarthritis, testing drugs such as cntx-4975-05, qutenza, and lidocaine, with key inclusion criteria including BMI between 18.0-35.0 kg/m^2 and confirmation of osteoarthritis in the index knee.

This sample is a phase 1 clinical trial testing the drug ly3322207 and placebo in healthy males and females with hypertension, who meet specific inclusion criteria and do not have any exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for inguinal hernia repair, testing the drugs tlc590 and naropin, with eligibility criteria including age, ASA physical status, BMI, and exclusion criteria such as abnormal lab tests, history of seizures, and concurrent opioid therapy.

This sample is a phase I trial for patients with locally advanced pancreatic cancer, borderline pancreatic inoperable cancer, or pancreatic cancer, testing the effectiveness of folfirinox and gemcitabine nab-paclitaxel as treatment options, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria outlined.
This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with various lymphomas and lymphoproliferative disorders, testing the drug pacritinib, and includes detailed eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.
This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial testing the drug febuxostat for the treatment of tumor lysis syndrome in patients of various age groups, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase I trial for patients with rheumatoid arthritis, testing the effectiveness of steroids in resolving inflammation in the atlantoaxial joint, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with recurrent or metastatic squamous cell carcinoma of the head or neck, testing the drugs nivolumab and afatinib, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with relapsed or refractory acute leukemia, testing the effectiveness of anti-CD123 CAR-T treatment, with specific eligibility criteria including confirmation of CD123 positivity, performance status score, kidney and liver function, and previous treatment timelines.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 clinical trial for patients with multiple myeloma in relapse or progression, testing the efficacy of tinostamustine as consolidation therapy followed by autologous stem cell transplantation.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with relapsed/refractory precursor cell lymphoblastic leukemia-lymphoma, testing the drug ixazomib, with specific eligibility criteria including prior therapeutic attempts and recovery from acute toxic effects of prior treatments.

This sample is a phase 1 trial for patients with HER2-positive breast cancer, testing the drugs copanlisib and trastuzumab emtansine in combination, with eligibility criteria including prior treatment with trastuzumab and a taxane, and at least one measurable lesion according to RECIST criteria.
